document_data.mainbody: '''Allisa of the Mists''' was a powerful [[human]] [[paladin]] and a "mistrider" or "mistwalker," active in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Allisa was a talented combatant and a devoted follower of her [[deity]]. While she used her strength to fight, she never hesitated to shield members of her church from harm. She was known for her gentle and caring personality that contrasted with her strong exterior.
document_data.Possessions: Allisa was known to wear a full set of ''[[enchanted]] +2 [[plate armor]]'' as well as a magical ''+3 [[shield]]'' which bolstered her in combat. Additionally, she wielded a ''[[scimitar of speed]]'' and a ''[[helm of telepathy]]'', giving her the advantage in any fight.
document_data.Abilities: Allisa of the Mists gained her nickname for her uncanny ability to pass through any mist, along with her unicorn mount, into any of the [[Domains of Dread]] she chose.
document_data.Activities: The paladin was known to arrive always with the morning mists.{{cite book/Spellfire Reference Guide|121}}
document_data.History: At some point, Allisa's trusted mount was a [[unicorn]] named [[Skuldreir]].{{cite web| url = http://web.archive.org/web/20220307162146/https://twitter.com/theedverse/status/1350540621241585664| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 3-7-2022| date = 1-16-2021}} Later, the creature was replaced by another unicorn named [[Cissl]] who found the paladin on its own accord and the duo were inseparable ever since.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Sages had debated that the mysterious heroine may have been a minor avatar of [[Lathander]]. A few claimed she must've been tied to the lands of [[Ravenloft]].
